sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react';
import { ScrollView, View } from 'react-native';
import { Appbar, Card, Text, ProgressBar, Button, FAB, List, RadioButton } from 'react-native-paper';

export default function UjianScreen({ navigation }) {
	const [value, setValue] = useState('first');

	return (
		<>
			<Appbar.Header>
				<Appbar.BackAction onPress={() => navigation.goBack()} />
				<Appbar.Content title="Pre Test" />
			</Appbar.Header>

			<ScrollView style={{ marginHorizontal: 20, marginVertical: 30 }}>
				<Text variant="titleMedium" style={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Soal : 10 dari 50</Text>
				<View style={{ marginVertical: 15 }}>
					<ProgressBar progress={0.2} />
				</View>

				<View style={{ marginVertical: 15 }}>
					<Text variant="titleMedium" style={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>Siapa Presiden ke 9?</Text>
					<RadioButton.Group onValueChange={newValue => setValue(newValue)} value={value}>
						<View>
							<RadioButton value="first" />
							<Text>First</Text>
						</View>
						<View>
							<RadioButton value="second" />
							<Text>Second</Text>
						</View>
					</RadioButton.Group>
				</View>
			</ScrollView>

			<View style={{ flexDirection: 'row' }}>
				<Button icon="arrow-left" mode="contained" onPress={() => navigation.navigate('CariKelasScreen')} style={{ flex: 1, margin: 10 }}>Prev</Button>
				<Button icon="arrow-right" mode="contained" onPress={() => navigation.navigate('CariKelasScreen')} contentStyle={{ flexDirection: 'row-reverse' }} style={{ flex: 1, margin: 10 }}>Next</Button>
			</View>
		</>
	);
}
